channel.title: [Class Suggestion] CYCLOPS! (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
**Cyclops**
Passive 1: **Granite Hide** - You cannot be murdered at night.
Passive 2: **Bloodshot Eye** - You will appear to be bleeding to healers the first time they heal you.
_^ Fool others into thinking you're an innocent player the Cyclops has bled._
Day Action: **Caged Sirens** - Force a player to use their night ability on you the following night. (2 uses)
Night Action 1: **Lambs to the Slaughter** - Kill all who visit you, unless they have chosen to attack you. (3 uses)
Night Action 2: **Gnash** - Select a player to attack. If your target is visited, you will inflict bleeding on their visitors instead of killing your target. (Unlimited use)
**Optional Lore:** If you don't like the idea of a giant cyclops in the game, you may consider this character a more human-like one-eyed brute with tenancies toward cannibalism and entrapping sirens. XD
**Comments:** "Gnash" may be OP, but keep in mind your target really won't have that many visitors, if any. You also can't kill your original target if you bleed others, so it's a bit of a trade off. This is of course open to edits.
